rooms.description: Spacious living area with eco-friendly materials and natural lighting.
Energy-efficient kitchen with recycled materials and energy-saving appliances.
Well-insulated home theater with soundproofing and eco-friendly LED lighting.
Primary bedroom featuring spacious balcony for relaxation and natural ventilation.
Secondary bedroom with a spacious balcony and ample natural light.
Compact, eco-friendly bathroom with water-saving fixtures.
Utility room for storage and laundry with eco-friendly practices.

openings.description: Main entrance following Vastu principles for positive energy flow and wheelchair accessibility.
Large window providing ample natural light, designed per eco-friendly standards.
Service entrance with accessible design and energy efficient features.

vastu_notes: The layout is arranged in accordance with Vastu principles ensuring the main entrance, living spaces, and bedrooms are optimally positioned. The design emphasizes natural light, ventilation, and eco-friendly materials while maintaining wheelchair accessibility.
